TopicTitle: But really a [TRACK] Launch Music (Egg Rocket Remix)

Articles.Content:
Hot off the editing software for those launches where you just need rocket themed music...

DOWNLOAD:: One Million Tons of Thrust (Egg Rocket Zone)

Rar packaged, contains .ogg and .mp3 formats of the file.

And here's a picture of something in space. Because picture and space and satellites and stuff:

Product is released under the 'D-BAD' (Don't Be a Dofus) License. In short, do what you want and include it in what you want, just don't claim it as your work.

Edited August 31, 2014 by AdmiralTigerclaw

I'd....don't...think I understand what this is....

Are you giving us music you made, or is it a mod that plays music? Or something else entirely...

But best of luck with it either way
I can only mark it as a [PART] or a [PLUGIN], but I'm giving you a music track.

AdmiralTigerclaw, as per the official Add-on posting Rules, could you please specify a license for your add-on?

General Add-on posting rules

1. Licenses

All add-ons that are posted on the services maintained by Squad that serve the KSP Community (such as this forum and Curse) must be accompanied by a license that regulates what other users can do with the copyrighted material. This license must be made available in both the download file and in the location the user downloads from (such as a forum post or a Curse listing).

Further information can be found in the License Selection Guide.
So...this isn't really an add-on, is it? Just an audio file.

Hm should be in the other forums not in the add-ons and releases?

Edited August 31, 2014 by Joshwoo69
spelling error

I...I'm sorry...I don't like it.

Doesn't sound very...Kerbal...

More like a Russian LGBT Club music for a space themed party...

Doesn't sound very...Kerbal...
